column4: na Miriam. Na Aaron ne mba; Nadab na Abihu

column3: (ɔno nye nyia odzii sɔfo wɔ dan no a Solomon sii no wɔ Jerusalɛm no mu no:)"

column2: "na Jehozadak kɔr ndɔmmumyɛ mu wɔ aber a EWURADZE nam Nebukadenezar nsa do faa Juda na Jerusalɛm kɔree no."
"Na iyinom nye Gersonmba no hɔn edzin; Libni na Simei."
"Merari ne mba; Mahili na Mushi. Na iyinom nye Levifo ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi tsetsee."
"Elkana dze: Elkana n'asefo binom nye Zofai
"Na woyinom nye hɔn a David dze hɔn sisii EWURADZE fie ndwom edwuma do
column3: ofi ber a adaka no nyaa ahomgye no."

column2: "Na wɔdze ndwom somee wɔ ehyiadzibuw no ne ntamadan no enyim
column3: dze kodur dɛ Solomon sii EWURADZE ne fi no wɔ Jerusalɛm: na wɔkɔr do soom ndzidzido ndzidzido

column2: "Na woyinom nye hɔn a wogyinae na hɔn mba no. Kohatfo no mba mu: ɔdwontofo Heman a ofi woyinom hɔn ebusuasantsen mu. Joel
"Na no nua Asaf a ogyinaa ne nsa enyimfa no
"Na abankum afamu hɔn nuanom Merari: Etan a ofi woyinom ebusua mu no: Kishi
"Na hɔn nuanom Levifo no wɔdze hɔn maa Nyankopɔn ne fie ntamadan ho som nyinara."
"Na Aaron na ne mba na wɔbɔɔ afɔr wɔ ɔhyew afɔrmbukyia no do
column4: wɔdze maa bea krɔnkrɔn edwuma no nyinara
column6: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n'akowaa Moses hyɛe no nyinara."

column2: "Afei iyinom nye hɔn tsenabea horow dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nseraban tsetsee wɔ hɔn ahe do: Aaronmba no a wofi Kohatfo ebusua mu no nyaa hɔn kyɛfa
column3: osiandɛ hɔndze no nye tonto a odzi kan
column5: "hɔn na wɔmaa hɔn Hebron a ɔwɔ Juda asaase do
column6: na no nkurotsia asaase a ɔabɔ ho aprɔw no;"

column4: wɔdze maa Jefune ne ba Kaleb."

column2: "Na wɔdze guansumabew nkurow no maa Aaron ne mba no
column4: Hebron; Libna so nye ne mfikyisaase

column2: "na Benjamin ebusuakuw mu so; Geba nye ne mfikyisaase
column4: na Anathot nye ne mfikyisaase. Hɔn nkurow a ɔwɔ hɔn ebusua ebusua mu nyinara yɛ nkurow duebiasa."

column2: "Na Kohatmba nkaa no wɔnam tonto do fi ebusuakuw no mu ebusua mu

column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee no
column7: na Manaasɛ ebusuakuw a ɔwɔ Bashan no mu

column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee

column2: "Na Israelmba no dze nkurow no nye ne mfikyisaase no maa Levifo no."
"Na wɔnam tonto do dze Judamba ebusuakuw mu
column4: nkurow yi a wɔabobɔ dzin yi mae."

column2: "Na Kohatmba ebusua ebusua no mu binom nyaa hɔn ahe do nkurow wɔ Efraim ebusuakuw mu."

column3: Sekem nye ne mfikyisaase wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow mu; Gezer so nye ne mfikyisaase;"

column2: "na Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no mu: Aner nye ne mfikyisaase
column4: wɔdze maa Kohatmba ebusua nkaa no."

column2: "Gersonmba no wɔmaa hɔn Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no ebusua mu
column3: Golan a ɔwɔ Bashan nye ne mfikyisaase

column2: "na Isakar ebusuakuw mu; Kedes nye ne mfikyisaase
"na Aser ebusuakuw mu; Mashal nye ne mfikyisaase
"na Hukok nye ne mfikyisaase; na Rehob nye ne mfikyisaase:"
"na Naftali ebusuakuw mu; Kedes a ɔwɔ Galilii nye ne mfikyisaase

column5: Bezer a ɔwɔ sar no do nye ne mfikyisaase

column2: "Gad ebusuakuw mu; Ramot a ɔwɔ Gilead nye ne mfikyisaase
